quiz.question: Identify the keyword used to define a class in Java.
Identify the smallest country in the world by land area.
Identify the part of speech of the word 'quickly'.
Identify the concept in quantum mechanics that describes the wave-particle duality.
Identify the correct plural form of 'child'.
Identify the year when the first man landed on the moon.
Identify the design pattern which decouples an abstraction from its implementation in Java.
Identify the synonym of 'happy' in Basic English.
Identify the scientific theory that explains the origin of the universe.
Identify the actor who played the role of The Joker in the 2008 film 'The Dark Knight'.
Identify the national flower of the Philippines.
Identify the official language of the Philippines.
Identify the historical event that signaled the start of the Philippine Revolution against Spain.
Identify the highest mountain in the Philippines.
Identify the capital city of the Philippines.
